name: Axew
description: The Tusk Pokémon. They mark their territory by leaving gashes in trees with their tusks. If a tusk breaks, a new one grows in quickly.

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.description: This Pokémon adds its proficiency bonus to damage when attacking a Pokémon of the same type.

abilities.name: Mold Breaker
abilities.description: This Pokémon's moves ignore any abilities that would lessen their effect or ability to hit an opponent (Due to things like Water Absorb, Snow Cloak, Thick Fat, Sturdy, etc.)

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.description: Opponents in combat with this Pokémon cannot eat held berries.
